column4: in spectral analysis, Mode 1 (corresponding to eigenvalue ?=0) is special. It is often called the "trivial" mode or the "DC offset." It represents the overall average energy of the whole system, not a pattern of imbalance. Its eigenvector u? is just a flat line where all faces have the same value.

column1: Dominant Mode of Imbalance & Required Delta Vector

column4: Delta Value > 0 (Positive): These are the faces the math is telling you to ADD ENERGY TO. These are the underdeveloped, weak aspects that are holding the system back. This is the pole of "Being & Integrity"—it needs to be stronger.

Delta Value < 0 (Negative): These are the faces the math is telling you have TOO MUCH ENERGY relative to the other side of the pole. Their activity is currently "pulling" the system out of balance. This is the pole of "Action & Doing"—it needs to be balanced by the Being pole.
The Breath Ratio (ABB Score) tells you the story of the balance between the two opposing poles. It's intuitive, relational, and gives a clear directional sense (over-exhale or under-exhale).

The Dissonance Index (ABD Score) tells you the story of the magnitude of the imbalance. It's a single, absolute number that you can track over time. As you implement your corrective actions, you should see this number get smaller and smaller. It is the direct measure of the "loudness of the sour note."

column15: Positive Delta Values (?E > 0): These are the faces that had a NEGATIVE loading in the original "problem" vector. This means they are WEAK, UNDERDEVELOPED, or DEFICIENT. The positive delta is the PRESCRIPTION: you must ADD ENERGY to these faces. They need to be increased and strengthened. These are the faces on the "Reception/Being" pole.

Negative Delta Values (?E < 0): These are the faces that had a POSITIVE loading in the original "problem" vector. This means they are TOO STRONG, OVEREXTENDED, or DOMINANT relative to their partners. The negative delta is the PRESCRIPTION: you must either REDUCE their energy or, more accurately, hold their energy steady while you dramatically increase the energy of the positive-delta faces. These are the faces on the "Projection/Action" pole.
